activities: iReminder manages patient adherence programs for medications, appointments and refills. To improve patient adherence, reminders are sent to patients through outbound IVR phone calls, SMS text messages and/or email. Messages are sent after the patient provides permission. Patients may opt-out of the our adherence programs at any time and have the option of viewing data collected and of having their data deleted.
personaldata: Patient and Nurse -- Patient and Nurse Enrollment forms are manually entered, after which all data are processed electronically
recoursemech: We are committed to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
